title: Preventing depopulation by improving technological endowment: A methodology for identifying priority municipalities

Author(s): Beatriz Sánchez, Javier Velázquez, Ramón Pérez, Javier Jorge-Vázquez, Inmaculada Gómez, Sergio Luis Nañez Alonso, Mª. Peana Chivite-Cebolla, Rui Alexandre Castanho
